name: The Book of the Damned
description:
Find the Book of the Damned and get out alive!

Controls

  • WASD = Move
  • LShift = Run
  • Mouse = Look
  • F = Interact (pick up book / open door to escape)
  • T = Toggle flashlight
  • Esc = Pause menu (may need to double press)

This project was for the Weekly Game Jam - Week 257 (Books), also my first ever game jam!

P.S. Idk why, but the game runs smoother on my Mac than on my gaming PC...??
